name: TANKSuspension
description:
Control

Move: WASD   

Respawn: Ctrl + Space bar    

Choose a Tank: V   

Zoom in/out: Mouse Wheel    

Quit game: Escape

Goal

Choose your Tank pass the Tank suspension test by delivering all cargo to the tunnel within limited time.

NYU Game Center prototype studio week 9

Instructor: Bennett Foddy 

Prompt: Endurance/Balance?
